ludonope.description: A responsive, multilang and animated website made by hand with Vue.js, Typescript and knowledge.

blt.description: 'Beach Launch Team is a liquid-fueled rocketry club at California State University Long Beach. I worked on a live vehicle tajectory visualization using Cesium.js. I also participated to a static fire and launch attempt for the FAR-Mars competition. Finally, I met amazing people there.

rematch.description: Rematch is an app which makes the process of capturing amateur sport easy. I lead the setup of a new backend using AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito, EC2) and Go. I also guided the setup of the new frontend in Vue.js and deployment on AWS (S3, Cloudfront).

manacore.description: Manacore is a powerful modular ERP SaaS that provides your company with a collection of easy to use services, 100% customizable. It uses the AWS ecosystem (Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito, Cloudfront, S3, SNS, SQS) and a homemade module system in Vue.js. This is my senior project with 5 other Epitech students.
